# WiFi details

Gov Wifi is reliable - if you have already signed up.

Otherwise:

Username - ONS Guest
Password - onsguestaccess

Password will need to be input into a webpage. This should launch automatically - please ask for assistance.

# Incidentals

![\incidentals](images/incidentals.png)

## Fire Alarm / Fire Alarm Tests

If a fire alarm sounds and it is not a system test, please follow your trainer to the nearest fire espace. Please leave all belongings behind. Please assemble at your assembly point. Visitors will be guided to the relavant place.

## Toilets

Please note the location of the nearest male, female and accessible/gender neutral toilets.

## Prayer/ Mediation Room

Please note the location of the nearest Prayer/Meditation room.

These have an "occupied" / "not occupied" slider.

Please be aware that at busy times there may be a wait for these facilities. Please be patient and respectful of others right to use these rooms.

## Mobile Phones

Please leave the room if you need to make/take a call. Please be mindful of other working areas near training rooms.

## Timings

Course timings are all aproximate.
Courses will include a morning break, lunch break and afternoon break.
